original: Majjhima Nikāya 53
analyzed: majjhima nikāya

original: Sekhasutta
analyzed: sekhasutta

original: Evaṁ me sutaṁ—
analyzed: evam me suta

original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmiṁ nigrodhārāme.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmin nigrodha ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena kāpilavatthavānaṁ sakyānaṁ navaṁ santhāgāraṁ acirakāritaṁ hoti anajjhāvuṭṭhaṁ samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā kenaci vā manussabhūtena.
analyzed: tena khalu pana samayena kāpilavatthavānam sakyānam navam santhāgāram acira kāritam hoti an ajjhāvuṭṭham samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā kenacid vā manussa bhūtena

original: Atha kho kāpilavatthavā sakyā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ
analyzed: atha khalu kāpilavatthavāḥ sakyāḥ yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkamiṣu upasaṅkamitvā bhagavanta

original: abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu. Ekamantaṁ nisinnā kho kāpilavatthavā sakyā bhagavantaṁ etadavocuṁ:
analyzed: abhivādetvā ekamantam ekamantam nisīdisu ekamantam nisinnāḥ kho kāpilavatthavāḥ sakyāḥ bhagavantam etat avocuḥ

original: “idha, bhante, kāpilavatthavānaṁ sakyānaṁ navaṁ santhāgāraṁ acirakāritaṁ anajjhāvuṭṭhaṁ samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā kenaci vā manussabhūtena.
analyzed: idha bhante kāpilavatthavānam sakyānam navam santhāgāram acira kāritam an ajjhāvuṭṭham samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā kenacid vā manussa bhūtena

original: Taṁ, bhante, bhagavā paṭhamaṁ paribhuñjatu. Bhagavatā paṭhamaṁ paribhuttaṁ pacchā kāpilavatthavā sakyā paribhuñjissanti.
analyzed: ta bhante bhagavā paṭhamam paribhuñjatu bhagavatā paṭhamam paribhuttam pacchā kāpilavatthavā sakyā paribhuñjissanti

original: Tadassa kāpilavatthavānaṁ sakyānaṁ dīgharattaṁ hitāya sukhāyā”ti.
analyzed: tat assa kāpilavatthavānam sakyānam dīgharattam hitāya sukhāya ati

original: Adhivāsesi bhagavā tuṇhībhāvena.
analyzed: adhivāsesi bhagavā tuṇhībhāvena

original: Atha kho kāpilavatthavā sakyā bhagavato adhivāsanaṁ viditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṁ
analyzed: atha khalu kāpilavatthavāḥ sakyāḥ bhagavataḥ adhivāsanam viditvā uṭṭhāya āsanā bhagavanta

original: abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā yena navaṁ santhāgāraṁ tenupasaṅkamiṁsu; upasaṅkamitvā
analyzed: abhivādetvā padakkhiṇam katvā yena navam santhāgāram tena upasaṅkamisu upasaṅkamitvā

original: sabbasanthariṁ santhāgāraṁ santharitvā āsanāni paññapetvā udakamaṇikaṁ upaṭṭhapetvā
analyzed: sabba santharim santhāgāram santharitvā āsanāni paññapetvā udaka maṇikam upaṭṭhapetvā

original: telappadīpaṁ āropetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
analyzed: telappadīpam āropetvā yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkamisu

original: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ aṭṭhaṁsu.
analyzed: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam aṭṭhasu

original: Ekamantaṁ ṭhitā kho kāpilavatthavā sakyā bhagavantaṁ etadavocuṁ:
analyzed: eka mantam ṭhitāḥ kho kāpilavatthavāḥ sakyāḥ bhagavantam etat avocuḥ

original: “sabbasanthariṁ santhataṁ, bhante, santhāgāraṁ, āsanāni paññattāni, udakamaṇiko upaṭṭhāpito, telappadīpo āropito.
analyzed: sabbasantharim santhata bhante santhāgāre āsanāni paññattāni udaka maṇikaḥ upaṭṭhāpito tela ppadīpaḥ āropito

original: Yassadāni, bhante, bhagavā kālaṁ maññatī”ti.
analyzed: yaḥ sadāni bhante bhagavā kālam maññati iti

original: Atha kho bhagavā nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya saddhiṁ bhikkhusaṅghena yena santhāgāraṁ
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā nivāsetvā patta cīvaram ādāya saddhim bhikkhu saṅghena yena santhāgāra

original: tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā pāde pakkhāletvā santhāgāraṁ pavisitvā majjhimaṁ thambhaṁ
analyzed: tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā pāde pakkhāletvā santhāgāram pavisitvā majjhimam thambha

original: nissāya puratthābhimukho nisīdi.
analyzed: nissāya purattha abhimukhaḥ nisīdi

original: Bhikkhusaṅghopi kho pāde pakkhāletvā santhāgāraṁ pavisitvā pacchimaṁ bhittiṁ nissāya puratthābhimukho nisīdi, bhagavantaṁyeva purakkhatvā.
analyzed: bhikkhu saṅghaḥ api kho pāde pakkhāletvā santhāgāram pavisitvā pacchimam bhittim nissāya purattha abhimukhaḥ nisīdi bhagavantayā iva purakkhatvā

original: Kāpilavatthavāpi kho sakyā pāde pakkhāletvā santhāgāraṁ pavisitvā puratthimaṁ bhittiṁ nissāya pacchimābhimukhā nisīdiṁsu, bhagavantaṁyeva purakkhatvā.
analyzed: kāpilavatthavāpi kho sakyā pāde pakkhāletvā santhāgāram pavisitvā puratthimam bhittim nissāya pacchima abhimukhāḥ nisīdisu bhagavantayā iva purakkhatvā

original: Atha kho bhagavā kāpilavatthave sakye bahudeva rattiṁ dhammiyā kathāya sandassetvā samādapetvā samuttejetvā sampahaṁsetvā āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ āmantesi:
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavā kāpilavatthave sakye bahudeva rattim dhammiyā kathāya sandassetvā samādapetvā samuttejetvā sampahasetvā āyasmantam ānandam āmantesi

original: “paṭibhātu taṁ, ānanda, kāpilavatthavānaṁ sakyānaṁ sekho pāṭipado.
analyzed: paṭibhātu te ānanda kāpilavatthavānam sakyānam sekhaḥ pāṭipadaḥ

original: Piṭṭhi me āgilāyati;
analyzed: piṭṭhi me āgilāyati

original: tamahaṁ āyamissāmī”ti.
analyzed: tam aham āyamissāmi iti

original: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho āyasmā ānando bhagavato paccassosi.
analyzed: eva bhante iti kho āyasmai ānandaḥ bhagavataḥ paccassosi

original: Atha kho bhagavā catugguṇaṁ saṅghāṭiṁ paññāpetvā dakkhiṇena passena sīhaseyyaṁ kappesi, pāde pādaṁ accādhāya, sato sampajāno, uṭṭhānasaññaṁ manasi karitvā.
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā catugguṇam saṅghāṭim paññāpetvā dakkhiṇena passena sīha seyyam kappesi pāde pādam accādhāya sataḥ sampajānaḥ uṭṭhāna saññam manasi karitvā

original: Atha kho āyasmā ānando mahānāmaṁ sakkaṁ āmantesi:
analyzed: atha kho āyasmai ānandaḥ mahānāmam sakkam āmantesi

original: “idha, mahānāma, ariyasāvako sīlasampanno hoti, indriyesu guttadvāro hoti, bhojane
analyzed: idha mahānāma ariya sāvako sīla sampanno hoti indriyesu gutta dvāraḥ hoti bhojane

original: mattaññū hoti, jāgariyaṁ anuyutto hoti, sattahi saddhammehi samannāgato hoti, catunnaṁ
analyzed: mattaññū hoti jāgariyam anuyuttaḥ hoti sattahi saddhammehi samannāgataḥ hoti catunna

original: jhānānaṁ ābhicetasikānaṁ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārānaṁ nikāmalābhī hoti akicchalābhī akasiralābhī.
analyzed: jhānānam ābhicetasikānam diṭṭhadhamma sukha vihārānam nikāma lābhī hoti a kiccha lābhī a kasira lābhī

original: Kathañca, mahānāma, ariyasāvako sīlasampanno hoti?
analyzed: kathañca mahānāma ariya sāvakaḥ sīla sampannaḥ hoti

original: Idha, mahānāma, ariyasāvako sīlavā hoti, pātimokkhasaṁvarasaṁvuto viharati ācāragocarasampanno aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī, samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu.
analyzed: idha mahānāma ariya sāvako sīlavā hoti pātimokkha savara savutaḥ viharati ācāra gocara sampannaḥ aṇumattesu vajjesu bhaya dassāvī samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu

original: Evaṁ kho, mahānāma, ariyasāvako sīlasampanno hoti.
analyzed: evam kho mahānāma ariya sāvako sīla sampannaḥ hoti

original: Kathañca, mahānāma, ariyasāvako indriyesu guttadvāro hoti?
analyzed: kathañca mahānāma ariya sāvakaḥ indriyesu gutta dvāraḥ hoti

original: Idha, mahānāma, ariyasāvako cakkhunā rūpaṁ disvā na nimittaggāhī hoti nānubyañjanaggāhī.
analyzed: idha mahānāma ariya sāvako cakkhunā rūpam disvā na nimitta ggāhī hoti na anubyañjana ggāhī

original: Yatvādhikaraṇamenaṁ cakkhundriyaṁ asaṁvutaṁ viharantaṁ abhijjhādomanassā pāpakā akusalā
analyzed: yatvā adhikaraṇam enam cakkhu indriyam asavutam viharantam abhijjhā domanassā pāpakāḥ akusalāḥ

original: dhammā anvāssaveyyuṁ tassa saṁvarāya paṭipajjati, rakkhati cakkhundriyaṁ, cakkhundriye saṁvaraṁ āpajjati.
analyzed: dhammāḥ anvāssaveyyum tassa savarāya paṭipajjati rakkhati cakkhu indriya cakkhu indriye savaram āpajjati

original: Sotena saddaṁ sutvā …pe…
analyzed: sotena saddam sutvā pe

original: ghānena gandhaṁ ghāyitvā …pe…
analyzed: ghānena gandham ghāyitvā pe

original: jivhāya rasaṁ sāyitvā …pe…
analyzed: jivhāya rasam sāyitvā pe

original: kāyena phoṭṭhabbaṁ phusitvā …pe…
analyzed: kāyena phoṭṭhabbam phusitvā pe

original: manasā dhammaṁ viññāya na nimittaggāhī hoti nānubyañjanaggāhī.
analyzed: manasā dhammam viññāya na nimitta ggāhī hoti na anubyañjana ggāhī

original: Yatvādhikaraṇamenaṁ manindriyaṁ asaṁvutaṁ viharantaṁ abhijjhādomanassā pāpakā akusalā
analyzed: yatvā adhikaraṇam enam man indriyam viharantam abhijjhā domanassā pāpakāḥ akusalāḥ

original: dhammā anvāssaveyyuṁ tassa saṁvarāya paṭipajjati, rakkhati manindriyaṁ, manindriye saṁvaraṁ āpajjati.
analyzed: dhammāḥ anvāssaveyyum tassa savarāya paṭipajjati rakkhati manindriya manindriye savaram āpajjati

original: Evaṁ kho, mahānāma, ariyasāvako indriyesu guttadvāro hoti.
analyzed: evam kho mahānāma ariya sāvakaḥ indriyesu gutta dvāraḥ hoti

original: Kathañca, mahānāma, ariyasāvako bhojane mattaññū hoti?
analyzed: kathañca mahānāma ariya sāvakaḥ bhojane mattaññū hoti

original: Idha, mahānāma, ariyasāvako paṭisaṅkhā yoniso āhāraṁ āhāreti:
analyzed: idha mahānāma ariya sāvako āhāram āhāra iti

original: ‘neva davāya na madāya na maṇḍanāya na vibhūsanāya; yāvadeva imassa kāyassa ṭhitiyā
analyzed: na iva davāya na madāya na maṇḍanāya na vibhūsanāya yāvat eva imassa kāyassa ṭhitiyā

original: yāpanāya vihiṁsūparatiyā brahmacariyānuggahāya. Iti purāṇañca vedanaṁ paṭihaṅkhāmi,
analyzed: yāpanāya brahmacariya anuggahāya iti purāṇam ca vedanam paṭihaṅkhāmi

original: navañca vedanaṁ na uppādessāmi, yātrā ca me bhavissati anavajjatā ca phāsuvihāro cā’ti.
analyzed: navam ca vedanam na uppādessāmi yātrā ca me bhavissati anavajja tā ca phāsu vihāraḥ ca ati

original: Evaṁ kho, mahānāma, ariyasāvako bhojane mattaññū hoti.
analyzed: evam kho mahānāma ariya sāvakaḥ bhojane mattaññū hoti

original: Kathañca, mahānāma, ariyasāvako jāgariyaṁ anuyutto hoti?
analyzed: kathañca mahānāma ariya sāvakaḥ jāgariyam anuyuttaḥ hoti

original: Idha, mahānāma, ariyasāvako divasaṁ caṅkamena nisajjāya āvaraṇīyehi dhammehi cittaṁ parisodheti,
analyzed: idha mahānāma ariya sāvakaḥ divasam caṅkamena nisajjāya āvaraṇīyehi dhammehi cittam parisodheti

original: rattiyā paṭhamaṁ yāmaṁ caṅkamena nisajjāya āvaraṇīyehi dhammehi cittaṁ parisodheti,
analyzed: rattiyā paṭhamam yāmam caṅkamena nisajjāya āvaraṇīyehi dhammehi cittam parisodheti

original: rattiyā majjhimaṁ yāmaṁ dakkhiṇena passena sīhaseyyaṁ kappeti, pāde pādaṁ accādhāya, sato sampajāno, uṭṭhānasaññaṁ manasi karitvā,
analyzed: rattiyāḥ majjhimam yāmam dakkhiṇena passena sīhaseyyam kappeti pāde pādam accādhāya sataḥ sampajānaḥ uṭṭhāna saññam manasi karitvā

original: rattiyā pacchimaṁ yāmaṁ paccuṭṭhāya caṅkamena nisajjāya āvaraṇīyehi dhammehi cittaṁ parisodheti.
analyzed: rattiyā pacchimam yāmam paccuṭṭhāya caṅkamena nisajjāya āvaraṇīyehi dhammehi cittam parisodheti

original: Evaṁ kho, mahānāma, ariyasāvako jāgariyaṁ anuyutto hoti.
analyzed: evam kho mahānāma ariya sāvakaḥ jāgariyam anuyuttaḥ hoti

original: Kathañca, mahānāma, ariyasāvako sattahi saddhammehi samannāgato hoti?
analyzed: kathañca mahānāma ariya sāvakaḥ sattahi saddhammehi samannāgataḥ hoti

original: Idha, mahānāma, ariyasāvako saddho hoti, saddahati tathāgatassa bodhiṁ:
analyzed: idha mahānāma ariya sāvako saddhaḥ hoti saddahati tathāgatassa bodhi

original: ‘itipi so bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno sugato lokavidū anuttaro purisadammasārathi satthā devamanussānaṁ buddho bhagavā’ti.
analyzed: iti pi saḥ bhagavā araham sammāsambuddhaḥ vijjā caraṇa sampanno sugataḥ loka vidū anuttaraḥ purisa damma sārathi satthā deva manussānam buddhaḥ bhagavā ati

original: Hirimā hoti, hirīyati kāyaduccaritena vacīduccaritena manoduccaritena, hirīyati pāpakānaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ samāpattiyā.
analyzed: hirimā hoti hirīyati kāya duccaritena vacī duccaritena manaḥ duccaritena hirīyati pāpakānam akusalānam dhammānam samāpattiyā

original: Ottappī hoti, ottappati kāyaduccaritena vacīduccaritena manoduccaritena, ottappati pāpakānaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ samāpattiyā.
analyzed: ottappī hoti ottappati kāya duccaritena vacī duccaritena manaḥ duccaritena ottappati pāpakānam akusalānam dhammānam samāpattiyā

original: Bahussuto hoti sutadharo sutasannicayo. Ye te dhammā ādikalyāṇā majjhekalyāṇā pariyosānakalyāṇā
analyzed: bahu sutaḥ hoti suta dharaḥ suta sannicayaḥ ye te dhammā ādi kalyāṇā majjhe kalyāṇā pariyosāna kalyāṇā

original: sātthā sabyañjanā kevalaparipuṇṇaṁ parisuddhaṁ brahmacariyaṁ abhivadanti tathārūpāssa
analyzed: sātthā sa byañjanā kevala paripuṇṇam parisuddham brahmacariyam abhivadanti tathārūpā sa

original: dhammā bahussutā honti dhātā vacasā paricitā manasānupekkhitā diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā.
analyzed: dhammāḥ bahu ssutāḥ honti dhātā vacasā paricitāḥ manasā anupekkhitāḥ diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā

original: Āraddhavīriyo viharati akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ pahānāya, kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ upasampadāya, thāmavā daḷhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu.
analyzed: āraddha vīriyaḥ viharati akusalānam dhammānam pahānāya kusalānam dhammānam upasampadāya thāmavā daḷha parakkamaḥ a nikkhitta dhuraḥ kusalesu dhammesu

original: Satimā hoti, paramena satinepakkena samannāgato, cirakatampi cirabhāsitampi saritā anussaritā.
analyzed: satimā hoti paramena sati nepakkena samannāgato cirakatam pi cira bhāsitam pi saritā anussaritā

original: Paññavā hoti, udayatthagāminiyā paññāya samannāgato, ariyāya nibbedhikāya sammā dukkhakkhayagāminiyā.
analyzed: paññavā hoti udaya ttha gāminiyā paññāya samannāgataḥ ariyāya nibbedhikāya sammā dukkha kkhaya gāminiyā

original: Evaṁ kho, mahānāma, ariyasāvako sattahi saddhammehi samannāgato hoti.
analyzed: evam kho mahā nāma ariya sāvakaḥ sattahi saddhammehi samannāgataḥ hoti

original: Kathañca, mahānāma, ariyasāvako catunnaṁ jhānānaṁ ābhicetasikānaṁ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārānaṁ nikāmalābhī hoti akicchalābhī akasiralābhī?
analyzed: kathañca mahānāma ariya sāvakaḥ catunnam jhānānam ābhicetasikānam diṭṭhadhamma sukha vihārānam nikāma lābhī hoti a kiccha lābhī a kasira lābhī

original: Idha, mahānāma, ariyasāvako vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati;
analyzed: idha mahānāma ariya sāvakaḥ vivicca iva kāmehi pe paṭhamam jhānam upasampajja viharati

original: vitakkavicārānaṁ vūpasamā ajjhattaṁ sampasādanaṁ …pe… dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati;
analyzed: vitakka vicārānam vūpasamāḥ ajjhattam sampasādanam pe dutiyam jhānam upasampajja viharati

original: pītiyā ca virāgā …pe… tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati;
analyzed: pītiyā ca virāgā pe tatiyam jhānam upasampajja viharati

original: sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānā pubbeva somanassadomanassānaṁ atthaṅgamā …pe… catutthaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
analyzed: sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānā pubbā iva somanassa domanassānaṃ atthaṅgamā pe catuttham jhānam upasampajja viharati

original: Evaṁ kho, mahānāma, ariyasāvako catunnaṁ jhānānaṁ ābhicetasikānaṁ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārānaṁ nikāmalābhī hoti akicchalābhī akasiralābhī.
analyzed: evam kho mahānāma ariya sāvakaḥ catunnam jhānānam ābhicetasikānam diṭṭhadhamma sukha vihārānam nikāma lābhī hoti a kiccha lābhī a kasira lābhī

original: Yato kho, mahānāma, ariyasāvako evaṁ sīlasampanno hoti, evaṁ indriyesu guttadvāro
analyzed: yatas kho mahānāma ariya sāvakaḥ evam sīla sampannaḥ hoti evam indriyesu gutta dvāro

original: hoti, evaṁ bhojane mattaññū hoti, evaṁ jāgariyaṁ anuyutto hoti, evaṁ sattahi saddhammehi
analyzed: hoti evam bhojane mattaññū hoti evam jāgariyam anuyuttaḥ hoti evam sattahi saddhammehi

original: samannāgato hoti, evaṁ catunnaṁ jhānānaṁ ābhicetasikānaṁ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārānaṁ
analyzed: samannāgataḥ hoti evam catunnam jhānānam ābhicetasikānam diṭṭhadhamma sukha vihārānaṃ

original: nikāmalābhī hoti akicchalābhī akasiralābhī, ayaṁ vuccati, mahānāma, ariyasāvako sekho
analyzed: nikāma lābhī hoti akiccha lābhī akasira lābhī ayam vuccati mahā nāma ariya sāvakaḥ sekho

original: pāṭipado apuccaṇḍatāya samāpanno, bhabbo abhinibbhidāya, bhabbo sambodhāya, bhabbo
analyzed: pāṭipadaḥ a puccaṇḍa tāya samāpannaḥ bhabbaḥ abhinibbhidāya bhabbaḥ sambodhāya bhabbaḥ

original: anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamāya.
analyzed: anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamāya

original: Seyyathāpi, mahānāma, kukkuṭiyā aṇḍāni aṭṭha vā dasa vā dvādasa vā tānāssu kukkuṭiyā
analyzed: sā iyyathā api mahānāma kukkuṭiyāḥ aṇḍāni aṭṭha vā dasa vā dvādasa vā kukkuṭiyā

original: sammā adhisayitāni sammā pariseditāni sammā paribhāvitāni, kiñcāpi tassā kukkuṭiyā
analyzed: sammā adhisayitāni sammā pariseditāni sammā paribhāvitāni kiñca api tassā kukkuṭiyā

original: na evaṁ icchā uppajjeyya:
analyzed: na evam icchā uppajjeyya

original: ‘aho vatime kukkuṭapotakā pādanakhasikhāya vā mukhatuṇḍakena vā aṇḍakosaṁ padāletvā sotthinā abhinibbhijjeyyun’ti,
analyzed: aho vati me kukkuṭa potakā pāda nakha sikhāya vā mukha tuṇḍakena vā aṇḍa kosam padāletvā sotthinā abhinibbhijjeyyunti

original: atha kho bhabbāva te kukkuṭapotakā pādanakhasikhāya vā mukhatuṇḍakena vā aṇḍakosaṁ padāletvā sotthinā abhinibbhijjituṁ.
analyzed: atha kho bhabbāva te kukkuṭa potakā pāda nakha sikhāya vā mukha tuṇḍakena vā aṇḍa kosam padāletvā sotthinā abhinibbhijjitu

original: Evameva kho, mahānāma, yato ariyasāvako evaṁ sīlasampanno hoti, evaṁ indriyesu guttadvāro
analyzed: evam eva kho mahānāma yatas ariya sāvakaḥ evam sīla sampannaḥ hoti evam indriyesu gutta dvāro

original: hoti, evaṁ bhojane mattaññū hoti, evaṁ jāgariyaṁ anuyutto hoti, evaṁ sattahi saddhammehi
analyzed: hoti evam bhojane mattaññū hoti evam jāgariyam anuyuttaḥ hoti evam sattahi saddhammehi

original: samannāgato hoti, evaṁ catunnaṁ jhānānaṁ ābhicetasikānaṁ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārānaṁ
analyzed: samannāgataḥ hoti evam catunnam jhānānam ābhicetasikānam diṭṭhadhamma sukha vihārānaṃ

original: nikāmalābhī hoti akicchalābhī akasiralābhī, ayaṁ vuccati, mahānāma, ariyasāvako sekho
analyzed: nikāma lābhī hoti akiccha lābhī akasira lābhī ayam vuccati mahā nāma ariya sāvakaḥ sekho

original: pāṭipado apuccaṇḍatāya samāpanno, bhabbo abhinibbhidāya, bhabbo sambodhāya, bhabbo
analyzed: pāṭipadaḥ a puccaṇḍa tāya samāpannaḥ bhabbaḥ abhinibbhidāya bhabbaḥ sambodhāya bhabbaḥ

original: anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamāya.
analyzed: anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamāya

original: Sa kho so, mahānāma, ariyasāvako imaṁyeva anuttaraṁ upekkhāsatipārisuddhiṁ āgamma anekavihitaṁ pubbenivāsaṁ anussarati,
analyzed: sa kho saḥ mahānāma ariya sāvakaḥ imayā iva anuttaram upekkhā sati pārisuddhim āgamma aneka vihitam pubbenivāsam anussarati

original: seyyathidaṁ—ekampi jātiṁ dvepi jātiyo …pe… iti sākāraṁ sauddesaṁ anekavihitaṁ pubbenivāsaṁ anussarati,
analyzed: sā iyyathidam ekam pi jātim dve pi jātiyaḥ pe iti sa ākāram sa uddesam aneka vihitam pubbenivāsam anussarati

original: ayamassa paṭhamābhinibbhidā hoti kukkuṭacchāpakasseva aṇḍakosamhā.
analyzed: ayam assa paṭhamā abhinibbhidā hoti kukkuṭa chāpakassa iva aṇḍakosamhā

original: Sa kho so, mahānāma, ariyasāvako imaṁyeva anuttaraṁ upekkhāsatipārisuddhiṁ āgamma
analyzed: sa kho saḥ mahānāma ariya sāvakaḥ imayā iva anuttaram upekkhā sati pārisuddhim āgamma

original: dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena satte passati cavamāne upapajjamāne
analyzed: dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkanta mānusakena satte passati cavamāne upapajjamāne

original: hīne paṇīte suvaṇṇe dubbaṇṇe sugate duggate …pe… yathākammūpage satte pajānāti,
analyzed: hīne paṇīte suvaṇṇe dubbaṇṇe sugate duggate pe yathā kammūpage satte pajānāti

original: ayamassa dutiyābhinibbhidā hoti kukkuṭacchāpakasseva aṇḍakosamhā.
analyzed: ayam assa dutiyā abhinibbhidā hoti kukkuṭa chāpakassa iva aṇḍakosamhā

original: Sa kho so, mahānāma, ariyasāvako imaṁyeva anuttaraṁ upekkhāsatipārisuddhiṁ āgamma
analyzed: sa kho saḥ mahānāma ariya sāvakaḥ imayā iva anuttaram upekkhā sati pārisuddhim āgamma

original: āsavānaṁ khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā
analyzed: āsavānam khayā anāsavam cetaḥ vimuttim paññā vimuttim diṭṭhe iva dhamme sayam abhiññā

original: sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati,
analyzed: sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati

original: ayamassa tatiyābhinibbhidā hoti kukkuṭacchāpakasseva aṇḍakosamhā.
analyzed: ayam assa tatiyā abhinibbhidā hoti kukkuṭa chāpakassa iva aṇḍakosamhā

original: Yampi, mahānāma, ariyasāvako sīlasampanno hoti, idampissa hoti caraṇasmiṁ;
analyzed: yam pi mahānāma ariya sāvako sīla sampanno hoti idam pissa hoti caraṇasmi

original: yampi, mahānāma, ariyasāvako indriyesu guttadvāro hoti, idampissa hoti caraṇasmiṁ;
analyzed: yampi mahānāma ariya sāvakaḥ indriyesu gutta dvāraḥ hoti idam pissa hoti caraṇasmi

original: yampi, mahānāma, ariyasāvako bhojane mattaññū hoti, idampissa hoti caraṇasmiṁ;
analyzed: yam pi mahānāma ariya sāvakaḥ bhojane mattaññū hoti idam pissa hoti caraṇasmi

original: yampi, mahānāma, ariyasāvako jāgariyaṁ anuyutto hoti, idampissa hoti caraṇasmiṁ;
analyzed: yam pi mahānāma ariya sāvakaḥ jāgariyam anuyuttaḥ hoti idam pissa hoti caraṇasmi

original: yampi, mahānāma, ariyasāvako sattahi saddhammehi samannāgato hoti, idampissa hoti caraṇasmiṁ;
analyzed: yam pi mahānāma ariyasāvakaḥ sattahi saddhammehi samannāgataḥ hoti idam pissa hoti caraṇasmi

original: yampi, mahānāma, ariyasāvako catunnaṁ jhānānaṁ ābhicetasikānaṁ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārānaṁ nikāmalābhī hoti akicchalābhī akasiralābhī, idampissa hoti caraṇasmiṁ.
analyzed: yam pi mahānāma ariyasāvakaḥ catunnam jhānānam ābhicetasikānam diṭṭhadhamma sukha vihārānam nikāma lābhī hoti akiccha lābhī akasira lābhī idam pissa hoti caraṇasmi

original: Yañca kho, mahānāma, ariyasāvako anekavihitaṁ pubbenivāsaṁ anussarati, seyyathidaṁ—ekampi
analyzed: yat ca kho mahānāma ariya sāvakaḥ aneka vihitam pubbenivāsam anussarati

original: jātiṁ dvepi jātiyo …pe… iti sākāraṁ sauddesaṁ anekavihitaṁ pubbenivāsaṁ anussarati,
analyzed: jātim dve api jātiyaḥ pe iti sa ākāram sa uddesam aneka vihitam pubbenivāsam anussarati

original: idampissa hoti vijjāya;
analyzed: idam pissa hoti vijjāya

original: yampi, mahānāma, ariyasāvako dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena satte
analyzed: yam pi mahānāma ariya sāvakaḥ dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkanta mānusakena satte

original: passati cavamāne upapajjamāne hīne paṇīte suvaṇṇe dubbaṇṇe sugate duggate …pe… yathākammūpage
analyzed: passati cavamāne upapajjamāne hīne paṇīte suvaṇṇe dubbaṇṇe sugate duggate pe yathākammūpage

original: satte pajānāti, idampissa hoti vijjāya.
analyzed: satte pajānāti idam pissa hoti vijjāya

original: Yampi, mahānāma, ariyasāvako āsavānaṁ khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati, idampissa hoti vijjāya.
analyzed: yam pi mahānāma ariya sāvakaḥ āsavānam khayā anāsavam cetaḥ vimuttim paññā vimuttim diṭṭhe iva dhamme sayam abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati idam pissa hoti vijjāya

original: Ayaṁ vuccati, mahānāma, ariyasāvako vijjāsampanno itipi caraṇasampanno itipi vijjācaraṇasampanno itipi.
analyzed: ayam vuccati mahānāma ariya sāvako vijjā sampannaḥ iti pi caraṇa sampannaḥ iti pi vijjā caraṇa sampannaḥ iti pi

original: Brahmunāpesā, mahānāma, sanaṅkumārena gāthā bhāsitā:
analyzed: brahmunāpesā mahā nāma sanaṅkumārena gāthā bhāsitā

original: ‘Khattiyo seṭṭho janetasmiṁ,
analyzed: khattiyaḥ seṭṭhaḥ janetasmi

original: ye gottapaṭisārino;
analyzed: ye gotta paṭisārino

original: Vijjācaraṇasampanno,
analyzed: vijjā ācaraṇa sampannaḥ

original: so seṭṭho devamānuse’ti.
analyzed: so seṭṭhaḥ deva mānusa iti

original: Sā kho panesā, mahānāma, brahmunā sanaṅkumārena gāthā sugītā no duggītā, subhāsitā no dubbhāsitā, atthasaṁhitā no anatthasaṁhitā, anumatā bhagavatā”ti.
analyzed: sā kho pana isā mahānāma brahmunā sanaṅkumārena gāthā su gītā no duggītā su bhāsitā no dubbhāsitā attha sahitā no anattha sahitā anumatā bhagavatā ati

original: Atha kho bhagavā uṭṭhahitvā āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ āmantesi:
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā uṭṭhahitvā āyasmantam ānandam āmantesi

original: “sādhu sādhu, ānanda,
analyzed: sādhu sādhu ānanda

original: sādhu kho tvaṁ, ānanda, kāpilavatthavānaṁ sakyānaṁ sekhaṁ pāṭipadaṁ abhāsī”ti.
analyzed: sādhu khalu tvaḥ ānanda kāpilavatthavānam sakyānam sekham pāṭipadam abhāsi iti

original: Idamavocāyasmā ānando.
analyzed: idam avoca ayasmai ānandaḥ

original: Samanuñño satthā ahosi.
analyzed: samanuññaḥ satthā ahosi

original: Attamanā kāpilavatthavā sakyā āyasmato ānandassa bhāsitaṁ abhinandunti.
analyzed: attamanāḥ kāpilavatthavāḥ sakyāḥ āyasmataḥ ānandassa bhāsitam abhinandunti

original: Sekhasuttaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ tatiyaṁ.
analyzed: sekha suttam niṭṭhitam tatiya
